php.LBL_PL_VAT_PAYER_LABEL: Verification of the status of the VAT payer
php.LBL_PL_VAT_PAYER_DESC: Verifies whether the entity is registered as a VAT taxpayer on prior to sending the inquiry based on the tax identification number.
php.LBL_VIES_DESC: The VAT Information Exchange System (VIES) is an electronic means of transmitting information relating to VAT registration (i.e., validity of VAT numbers) of companies registered in the European Union.
